'''Gary Rubin''' is the brother of [[Chuck Rubin]].

==History==
Gary came into the hospital with his brother, Chuck, when Chuck got an infection from a surgery Gary didn't think he should have had to lengthen his legs. When Chuck had to have surgery that ultimately made him shorter than he had been when he started, Gary said the only person who noticed or cared how short he was was himself.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
A woman named Laurie left him.

===Familial===
He was frustrated at his brother for constantly whining about being short.

==Notes and Trivia==
*He didn't try out for varsity basketball because he didn't want to make his brother feel bad for being too short to play.
*He's over six feet tall.
